message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. My maximum budget remains at $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement within my price range.
